title: How to win friends and influence people’s principles - Quora
tags: How to Win Friends and Influence People (1936 book)

response.answer_text: That is an interesting question; I was too at the time trying to find a strategy to this and there is a book named: “how to win friends and influence people” This book is by Dale Carnigie its also a bestseller and I would recommend this to anyone who is looking for improvements in relationships or in day to day life even though this came out in the 1930s it still applies in the world today. I suggest it would be a good idea to look at this as it can change your viewpoint upon the world and that what is around you. I hope this has helped in some way :)

You don’t win friends but correct your inner health first. If you develop good character, others will come around you due to being kind, considerate, supportive, and helpful person. Try your best to correct your inner health first and see how things will change in your life.
